WSUS31 KKCI 221455 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 46E 
VALID UNTIL 1655Z 
MI LS LM 
FROM 50NW SSM-10SW TVC 
LINE TS 25 NM WIDE MOV FROM 24020KT. TOPS TO FL320. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 221655-222055 
AREA 1...FROM SYR-SBY-50SSE ECG-ILM-CHS-GSO-BKW-ROD-DXO-SYR 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM 40NW BWG-SPA-IRQ-MCN-CTY-140W PIE-160S CEW-40NW BWG 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.

PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
